field.label: Reload URL
field.comment: Add URL of the page after loggin account with social completely. Example: https://yourdomain/customer/account/

field.label: Number Column on Large Desktop
field.comment: Large devices Desktops (≥1200px). Use in grid layout and masonry layout

field.label: Client ID
field.comment:
Register at : https://developer.wordpress.com/apps
Config Call back url: https://[yourdomain]/lofsociallogin/wordpress/callback

field.label: Client ID
field.comment:
Register at : https://github.com/settings/applications
Call back url: https://[yourdomain]/lofsociallogin/github/callback
